attributes.action: MAKE SURE THERE ARE NO CONFLICTS BETWEEN GOVERNMENT DEPTS AS THERE ARE NOW.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign if you agree that many issues raised conflict against other depts such as, one dept saying stop poluting the air to save the world and another saying build many more houses all with extra water, gas, and electric the loss of land, sewage ect, this also takes away land for wild life which is getting less and less each year, we can not build 100,000 more houses.

It would make more sense to restrict the amount of cars per household which would cut polution and parking issues to one per property, this conflicts with gases and there advert to reduce by 5 miles for each car which very few will take notice of, things have to be enforced to take effect, the government needs to either go green or do as they are going to do and that is all the above against it.

A lack of talking between depts.
